name: Free Will (TheLordBaski)
description:
# DESCRIPTION
You start with nothing, not event the level. You will gain control on your character and build the level by yourself.

# INSTRUCTIONS
Once you can move use `asdw` or with arrow keys. Jump with a `space` and use `mouse` to place blocks.

# MUSIC
Composed using the https://www.beepbox.co
OST is here
